## Other Logical Axioms


## Other Annotations

 * *[definition](../../IAO/15/IAO_0000115.md)* = An endothelium that is part of a heart [Automatically generated definition].
 * *[curator notes](../../IAO/32/IAO_0000232.md)* = this class includes any endothelia that are part of the heart. This might include the endocardial epithelia, as well as endothelia of vessels that are considered strictly part of the heart (e.g. outflow tract). As a grouping class, this may lack utility, and pending review this class may be obsoleted. For annotation consider a more specific class.
 * *[database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md)* = BTO:0004293
 * *[has_related_synonym](../../ym/oboInOwl#hasRelatedSynonym.md)* = cardiac endothelium
 * *[rdf-schema#label](../../el/rdf-schema#label.md)* = heart endothelium
